评论详情: Like the fit and the quality for the price

This blouse is very lovely. The fit is true to size and the blouse is comfortable to wear. Sometimes with sleeves like these they can be uncomfortable but that is not the case with this blouse. It is a light fabric and feels nice. The blouse works as expected and is beautiful.
Love the quality of the shirt and design. I can dress it up or down.

My daughter picked this out to wear to a memorial. She's top heavy, so I doubted it would fit. She put it on and it really fit her shape. She's 15 and petite so I thought it would be loose around her stomach and tight around her chest, but the fit was very flattering all over. Felt like good material and wasn't see through.
Beautiful and Chic!
I love it. It tapers very well on my body

This top is so cute!!! And it fits really well, except across the bust. Maybe another half inch of fabric or an extra button to keep it closed. I'm so disappointed. Guess I better have my safety pin ready.
I get tons of compliments when I wear it. I’ve dressed it up and I have worn it to casual business dinners with a pair of jeans and a good pair of stilettos. Will buy again in another color.
Love it. Perfect fit. Very comfortable.
Medium is a little snug--kind of a small plus. But otherwise this is fine for a fair price work top.

According to the size chart, the shirt should have fit. And, while I was able to get all of the buttons closed, I was one hefty sneeze from taking someone’s eye out ‘cause every single one of them buttons would have surely flown right the heck off! Also, and perhaps this is just because I have a gargantuan melon, but the shirt made me look like I had no neck. Going back.

I got this top to go with a blue shirt; adorable. It is long enough for me to tuck in and not pull out when I move. The bow makes it look super sweet and the sleeves fit well (I find my arms are bigger and struggle with short sleeve shirts). The white color is not too see through and the quality of the material feels good.

I’m roughly 185 and ordered an extra large. I had to send it back because it runs small. I was able to button it, but I had no breathing room. I don’t like for things to be tight on me. I like to have some looseness so I can breath! This shirt did not have any play room. Cannot wear a padded bra with this either, otherwise it wouldn’t button up. I ordered the white, you definitely need another shirt underneath. It’s very see through. I ended up returning it.

This blouse is so very sweet, I love it, but it is small.  This blouse does have a good amount of stretch BUT the space between the buttons opened right up, the tightness is primarily around the chest (I'm a 38DD) and a bit around the belly area. The shoulders were fine on me. I threw a black cami under it and I'm "getting away" with it for now, but haven't washed it.  Because I love this blouse so much, I just ordered a 3XL. I'm concerned it will be too big around the shoulder area, but we'll see.. I'll update this review when I receive the new top.  UPDATE: I received the 3XL, and it fits better, a bit big in the shoulders, but fine.. It has a firm place in my weekly work outfit rotation. So I guess if you might be busty, cant go wrong with sizing up.

评论概述: Huge neck hole on an otherwise cute blouse
评论详情: This top is adorable and fits well. Long enough in the body to tuck into a skirt and loose enough in the sleeve hems to fit around my thicc arms. The only negative to this blouse is that the neck is huge. Like wear it over a winter scarf huge. As a solution, I tied the neck bow normally and then placed a brooch on the collar to make the neckline fit closely.  It's weird how massive the neckhole is cut, but a brooch makes for an easy fix and it's otherwise adorable.

This could be super cute, if women were shaped like this. I'm usually a medium, size 6, 34D... So I ordered a medium. It's odd because once buttoned it's snug around the waist, but then the armpits are huge. They hang / connect with the shirt low. I don't recommend.
